ygData.msgSnippet: hehe i said it.  and cities aren t dungeons =P but yes i have friends who kill ogre guards all the time for cash, i think 11pp per kill.  they just hang out
ygData.messageBody:
hehe i said it. and cities aren't dungeons =P
but yes i have friends who kill ogre guards all the time for cash, i think
11pp per kill. they just hang out inside grobb and go to work hehe.

Shada

> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> Someone stated earlier that there are only 2 high level
> dungeons for all
> those lvl 50's out there. Well actually there are many more,
> the cities of
> races that are KoS to you and your friends. I have already
> seen Teir'dal in
> North Freeport killing the paladins there. I know of at
> least 2 attempts by
> good players to breach the gates of Neriak. Personally I am
> looking forward
> to storming the foul holes the Trolls and Orges call home.
>
